Package au.edu.ausstage.utils

Class Summary
CommandLineParser A class of methods useful when reading arguments from the command line
DateUtils A class of methods useful when processing dates in AusStage Services
DbManager A class of methods useful when interacting with a Database
DbObjects A class of methods to manage the database objects
EmailManager A class used to send email
EmailOptions A class used to manage the options for sending emails and configuring the EmailManager class
FileUtils A class of methods useful when validating file related tasks
HashUtils A class to provide convenience methods for hashing values.
InputUtils A class of methods useful when validating input to methods
LinksManager A class of methods useful when compiling links into the AusStage website
PropertiesManager A class of methods useful when reading data from a properties file
